Insurance Claim Attorney Virginia

* * *

# Virginia Insurance Claim Attorneys

At Wingfield, Ginsburg & Lipp P.C., we put our expert team to work for you
regarding insurance claims. We are experienced in unfair insurance practices
and insurance disputes. Our experienced trial lawyers will prepare for every
trial efficiently and effectively. We believe in keeping you informed to know
what to expect and represent your case in the best possible manner for
Virginia clients.

## Virginia Unfair Insurance Practices Attorney

If you feel that you have been the victim of unfair insurance practices here
in Virginia. Contact Wingfield, Ginsburg & Lipp P.C. to represent you against
the large and intimidating insurance companies. We won’t back down in our
representation of you and your case and handle your case in an aggressive
manner and don’t allow the insurance companies to unilaterally dictate how the
matter should be resolved.

Unfair insurance practices are committed when an insurance company or
insurance agent acts in a negligent or careless manner. Specifically, the
individual failed to act in accordance with accepted standards of the
profession.

## Types Of Unfair Insurance Practices:

Improper Claims Filed

Misrepresentation of Coverage

Billing Fraud

Failure to Reveal Policy Terms

Conflicts of Interest

Failure to Activate Insurance

Agent errors are most often caught when an insured individual files a claim
that is denied by the carrier. Often people would normally be covered on the
denied claim, and it came back denied due to negligent or intentional errors
by the insurance agent and/or insurance company. At Wingfield, Ginsburg &
Lipp, P.C., we have the experience necessary to handle settlement negotiations
and litigation concerns involving insurance agent malpractice.

Having a competent Virginia insurance claim attorney on your side to help you
navigate the often confusing and overwhelming issues that arise after an
insurance agent and/or insurance company malpractice incident has occurred is
vitally important. Our Virginia attorneys will serve as your advocate and can
assist you in getting legal and medical expenses paid by the proper party,
resolving the calamities created by the insurance agent/company and, if
necessary, filing a lawsuit to compensate you for your losses due to the
incident.

## Our Insurance Dispute Experts Can Help You With Your Claim

Nothing is more frustrating than having insurance that you have paid into for
years and then when you file a claim, and they don’t want to pay your claim or
offer you a ridiculous low-ball amount. If this has happened to you, you want
to pursue this with legal representation. Wingfield, Ginsburg & Lipp, P.C.
represents clients in Virginia with experienced and knowledgeable support.

Insurance companies have aggressive lawyers on retainer to deal with disputes.
We let the insurer know that you are serious about how they handled your
claim. If you feel that the insurance company is not providing you with the
coverage that you have agreed upon, then our reputable insurance dispute
attorneys are here to advise you fairly and honestly.

## We Are Ready To Represent You Today

For strong representation from a Virginia insurance lawyer dedicated to
maximizing your benefits, call Wingfield, Ginsburg & Lipp, P.C. now at
202-789-8000. There is no obligation to hire, and we collect no fees unless we
make a recovery or settlement on your behalf.

Schedule your free consultation, call us today at 202-789-8000.
